page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: In the 12km block covered,the village of{Outlane}is the highest inhabited settlement. It rises to a height of 288m at one point. The village is mainly residential with a mixture of old and new housing. Near the village is the old settlement of Slack and the site of a Roman Fort. A golf course covers the land immediately to the south east of the M62 motorway. { Holywell Green}and{Blackley}are both small, quiet villages to the north of Outlane.{Salendine Nook}and{Lindley } are mainly residential. Perhaps the most important feature of the whole 12km block is the{M62} motorway.
